alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Bradford County through 200 AM EDT... At 130 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ogdensburg to near Shunk to near Muncy Valley. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canton, West Franklin, Wilmot, West Burlington, New Albany, Overton, Alba, Franklindale, Le Roy and Grover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
